table_description: Access Applications are used to restrict access to a whole application using an authorisation gateway managed by Cloudflare.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Friendly name of the access application.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: ID of the account, access application belongs.

columns.name: account_name
columns.description: Name of the account, access application belongs.

columns.name: domain
columns.description: The domain and path that access will block.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the application was created.

columns.name: auto_redirect_to_identity
columns.description: Option to skip identity provider selection if only one is configured in allowed_idps. Defaults to false (disabled).

columns.name: custom_deny_message
columns.description: Option that returns a custom error message when a user is denied access to the application.

columns.name: custom_deny_url
columns.description: Option that redirects to a custom URL when a user is denied access to the application.

columns.name: enable_binding_cookie
columns.description: Option to provide increased security against compromised authorization tokens and CSRF attacks by requiring an additional \"binding\" cookie on requests. Defaults to false.

columns.name: session_duration
columns.description: How often a user will be forced to re-authorise. Must be in the format \"48h\" or \"2h45m\". Valid time units are ns, us (or Âµs), ms, s, m, h. Defaults to 24h.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the application was last modified.

columns.name: allowed_idps
columns.description: The identity providers selected for the application.

columns.name: cors_headers
columns.description: CORS configuration for the access application. See below for reference structure.
